title: Feather Fall
content:
Feather Fall Level 1 Transmutation Spell You and nearby allies gain Immunity to Falling damage. 10 turns 9m Bonus Action Level 1 Spell Slot

Level 1 Transmutation Spell

You and nearby allies gain Immunity to Falling damage.

Feather Fall is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Feather Fall is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Feather Fall Information

Description: You and nearby allies gain Immunity to Falling damage. Level: Lvl 1 spell School: Transmutation School Casting Time: Bonus Action Range: Self 9m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: None Ritual Spell: Yes

How to Acquire Feather Fall

Feather Fall can be acquired by the following classes:

Bard, Sorcerer, Wizard, Arcane Trickster, Eldritch Knight

Feather Fall can be cast by using the following items:

Mystra's Grace Corvid Token Potion of Feather Fall Scroll of Feather Fall

Feather Fall Tips & Notes

Feather Fall is a ritual spell which can be cast without expending a spell slot outside combat.
